name: Main Layout
description: Define the main layout of the Store of areas that are repeatable sections across the Store.

name: Home Page
description: Define the main layout of the Home Page everything below Header and above Footer.

name: Category
description: Define the main layout of the Categories Page, everything below Header and above Footer. Same template is used for all the Categories.

name: Product
description: Define the main layout of the Product Page, everything below Header and above Footer. Same template is used for all the Products.
